mapper.insert: insert into ecs_virtual_goods_card (card_id, goods_id, card_sn, add_date, end_date, is_saled, order_sn, is_verification, supplier_id, buy_date) values (#{card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{card_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{add_date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{end_date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_saled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_verification,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buy_date,jdbcType=INTEGER})
